title: Surviving Disasters - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/17/22
itunes:title: Surviving Disasters - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/17/22
description:
George Noory and psychologist Dr. Laurie Nadel explore her research into stress and anxiety, how anger has increased during the Covid pandemic, and her tips on how to find hope and strength to promote healing in your life.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
